identity.name: Paridhaan Creations
identity.core_philosophy: Swiss Grid Precision meets Indian Royal Warmth. Clean lines, rich textures, deep emotions.

primary.description: Deep Royal Peacock Blue. Use for primary buttons, active states, and strong brand moments.

secondary.description: Antique Brass/Gold. Use for borders, icons, and subtle highlights. NEVER for large backgrounds.

accent.description: Royal Maroon. Use for 'Sale' tags, urgent CTAs, and text emphasis.

background.description: Warm Cream / Handmade Paper tone. Avoid pure #FFFFFF. Use this for the main page background.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-none font-medium tracking-wide transition-all duration-300 ease-out hover:shadow-lg
buttons.secondary: border border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white h-12 px-8 rounded-none transition-all duration-300

cards.product: group relative bg-white border border-border/40 hover:border-secondary/50 transition-all duration-500 hover:shadow-xl overflow-hidden

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-none border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-secondary disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

textures.grain: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Use 'Cormorant Garamond' for all Headings. It is the soul of this brand.
CRITICAL: Use 'Manrope' for all body text. It provides the modern balance.
CRITICAL: Do not use rounded corners on buttons or inputs. Keep them sharp (rounded-none) or very subtle (rounded-sm) to mimic the precision of craftsmanship.
LAYOUT: For the Hero section, do not just slap text over an image. Use a split layout or a 'floating card' layout where the text sits on a solid paper-colored block overlapping the image.
NAVIGATION: Use a 'Glassmorphism' sticky header with a blur effect (backdrop-blur-md) to allow the rich colors to peek through.
PRODUCT CARDS: Focus on the image. Minimal text. The 'Add to Cart' button should only appear on hover to keep the interface clean.
FOOTER: Make it massive. Use a dark background (Primary Blue) with Gold text. Include the 'Peacock Abstract' image as a subtle watermark opacity-10.
FORMS: Use Shadcn components but strip the default rounded corners. Add a bottom border focus effect (border-b-2 border-secondary).
THEME: Default to LIGHT mode. The background should be #FDFBF7 (Cream), not #FFFFFF.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure the Gold (#D4AF37) is only used for large text or borders. Do not use it for small body text on white backgrounds.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Be bold with whitespace.
Use z-index to create depth. Layer images behind text blocks.
Add micro-interactions: Buttons should lift, images should zoom slightly on hover.
